title: Trade In options don't include pixel3a when purchasing Pixel 4
content:
I'm trying to purchase a pixel 4, and want to trade in my pixel 3a, however I don't see that option. I see options for (in order): 

Pixel XL
Pixel 3 XL
Pixel 3
Pixel 2 XL
Pixel 2
Pixel
Nexus 6P
Nexus 5X

Any idea why pixel3a is not listed?
